xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: export.pdf.options.template=주형 export.pdf.options.template.hint=PDF 템플릿 은 표지, 목차, 각 페이지의 머리글과 바닥글에 표시되는 정보를 제어합니다. export.pdf.options.loadFailure=PDF 내보내기 옵션을 로드하지 못했습니다 . export.pdf.hint=웹 브라우저를 사용하여 PDF (Portable Document Format)로 내보내기 export.pdf.modal.close=닫다 export.pdf.inProgress=PDF 로 내보내는 중 ... export.pdf.failed=PDF 로 내보내지 못했습니다. export.pdf.lastError=PDF 내보내기 로그 에 오류가 있습니다: {0} export.pdf.canceling=PDF 내보내기 취소 중 ... export.pdf.canceled=역이 저장되었지만, 일부 새롭게 실패한 검사가 있습니다: 일치하지 않는 마침표(.) export.pdf.cancelFailed=PDF 내보내기를 취소하지 못했습니다. export.pdf.loading=로드 중... export.pdf.pageReadyTimeout=웹페이지 인쇄 준비를 기다리는 동안 시간이 초과되었습니다. export.pdf.templates.default=기본 템플릿 export.pdf.templates.default.versionInfo={2}에 {1}이(가) 작성한 버전 {0} export.pdf.template.name=PDF 템플릿 export.pdf.template.hint=PDF 내보내기 에 사용되는 템플릿 ### Missing: export.pdf.template.provider=PDF Template Provider ### Missing: export.pdf.template.skinExtensionInfo=The CSS and JavaScript skin extensions provided by this page are also part of the PDF template and thus are loaded automatically when the PDF template is used. ### Missing: admin.export.pdf=PDF Export ### Missing: admin.export.pdf.description=Configure how wiki pages are exported to PDF. ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.status=Status ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.configuration=Configuration ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.saveComment=Updated the PDF export configuration from the Administration ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.reset=Reset ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.reset.hint=Restore the default configuration ### Missing: export.pdf.admin.reset.confirmation=Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration? All your changes will be lost. ### Missing: export.pdf.config.default=(default) ### Missing: export.pdf.config.empty=(empty) ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.label=Generator ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.hint=The tool used to generate the PDF. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.checking=Checking if the PDF generator is available... ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.checkFailed=Failed to check if the PDF generator is available. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.available=Available ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.unavailable=The PDF generator is currently unavailable. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.userBrowser.label=User Browser ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.userBrowser.hint=The PDF is generated client-side using the print function provided by the user's own web browser. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.chromeDockerContainer.label=Chrome Docker Container ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.chromeDockerContainer.hint=The PDF is generated server-side using a headless Chrome web browser running inside a Docker container on the same server as XWiki. ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.remoteChrome.label=Remote Chrome ### Missing: export.pdf.generator.remoteChrome.hint=The PDF is generated server-side using a remote Chrome web browser that may run on a different server than XWiki. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover=Cover ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover.hint=The information displayed on the first page. E.g. the title and the author ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc=Table of Contents ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc.hint=Usually lists the content headings along with their page numbers. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header=Header ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header.hint=The information displayed at the top of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the title ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer=Footer ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer.hint=The information displayed at the bottom of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the number of the page ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_metadata=Metadata ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_metadata.hint=The script that is evaluated for each wiki page included in the PDF export to produce the metadata to display in the PDF header or footer. The metadata is specified using a special binding named metadata whose value is a Map<String, String>. The metadata ends up in the HTML as attributes of the heading used to display the title of each wiki page. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates=Templates ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates.hint=The list of PDF templates the user can select from when exporting wiki pages to PDF. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_serverSide=Server Side ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_serverSide.hint=Whether the PDF export should be performed server-side, e.g. using a headless Chrome web browser running inside a Docker container, or client-side, using the user's web browser instead. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeHost=Chrome Host ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeHost.hint=The host running the headless Chrome web browser, specified either by its name or by its IP address. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeRemoteDebuggingPort=Chrome Remote Debugging Port ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeRemoteDebuggingPort.hint=The port number used for communicating with the headless Chrome web browser. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_xwikiURI=XWiki URI ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_xwikiURI.hint=The base URI that the headless Chrome browser should use to access the XWiki instance (e.g. the print preview page). Examples: localhost, localhost:9293, http://localhost, https://localhost:8080 ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerImage=Chrome Docker Image ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerImage.hint=The Docker image used to create the Docker container running the headless Chrome web browser. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerContainerName=Chrome Docker Container Name ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_chromeDockerContainerName.hint=The name of the Docker container running the headless Chrome web browser. This is especially useful when reusing an existing container. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_dockerNetwork=Docker Network ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_dockerNetwork.hint=The name or id of the Docker network to add the Chrome Docker container to. This is useful when XWiki itself runs inside a Docker container and you want to have the Chrome container in the same network in order for them to communicate. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_pageReadyTimeout=Page Ready Timeout ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_pageReadyTimeout.hint=The number of seconds to wait for the web page to be ready for print before timing out. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_maxContentSize=Maximum Content Size ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_maxContentSize.hint=The maximum content size, in kilobytes (KB), that can be included in a single PDF export. Use 0 to disable the limit. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_replaceFOP=Replace FOP ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_replaceFOP.hint=Replace the old PDF export based on Apache Formatting Objects Processor (FOP).
